name: mongermd
text:
Speaking from bad experience, IE 8 compatibility mode can introduce issues with layout and page behavior. Switching versions of jQuery or CSS workarounds do not always solve the issues. This [MSDN Blog post][1] contains a good overview of IE 8 compatibility mode issues and suggested resolutions. This [blog post][2] contains more developer-centric tips beyond the MSDN post.


  [1]: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/ie/archive/2009/03/12/site-compatibility-and-ie8.aspx
  [2]: http://www.evotech.net/blog/2009/03/ie8-css-support/
